answers.answer: My stomach had a lot of pain and I had the worst head ache. Just drink a ton and take it easy! Good luck

Stomach and back pain, headache, woozy, just drink a lot to make sure you get rehydrated, and watch out for any tightening of your stomach, incase you get contractions, because dehydration can cause preterm labor!

I was told to drink alot of gatorade or powerade, something with electrolytes when I was dehydrated. My symptoms were preterm labor, I had contractions ever 3 minutes and they couldn't get an IV in my hand because my veins were really shriveled….I also just felt like I got hit by a truck or something, really weak and sick….Some symptoms of being thirsty all the time is diabetes though, have you taken your glucose test yet?
Ok. Definitely will keep drinking. And yes I dix the test at 21 weeks. I'm now 27 weeks tomorrow. That all showed up good.

I get the same way chapped lips, constant thirst but I know I am getting plenty to drink. I do my own Lil test for dehydration Sry if this is tmi but if my pee is yellow I know I need more fluids if its clear like water i know I'm doing good
Thanks. Definitely will pay attention to that as well.
The constant thirst just doesn't ease up either, so keep on chugging water. Your body will tell you what it needs.

question: What does dehydration feel like? What are the symptoms? I don't know if I am dehydrated or not but I just feel thirsty all the time and my throat hurts a lot. And have chapped lips and have a belly ache. Please help.
title: dehydration
